What is the outlook for Alexander Disease ?,"The prognosis for individuals with Alexander disease is generally poor. Most children with the infantile form do not survive past the age of 6. Juvenile and adult onset forms of the disorder have a slower, more lengthy course.",NINDS,Alexander Disease
